title: Launcher Resolution Not Scaling to Native Desktop Resolution
body: After the new update my LoL Launcher's resolution doesn't scale properly with my native desktop resolution of 1920x1080. Everything inside the LoL Launcher is huge and it doesn't fit into the boundaries. I'm not quite sure what controls the content scaling so I need some help with fixing this issue.

replies.body: I have the same problem with the added trouble of the Pando Removal being stuck in the corner. I can't play league at all, so I don't particularly want to wait for a patch...?

Got the same problem myself, but only on my main computer. My other computer that runs one monitor doesn't have this issue.
I would assume this will be fixed next patch, but I find it a little annoying since I will have to go to the website to read the news.
